name: crawl
description: Crawl resources to prime their caches

arguments.name: from
arguments.description: The context key or resource ID to crawl from. Use "all" to process all web contexts.

arguments.name: version
arguments.description: The version you want to download

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: The path to download the file to

name: find
description: Search within this MODX instance using the "uberbar" search

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: The request to perform the search against

arguments.name: source
arguments.description: Path to MODX source (unused while command is disabled)

arguments.name: config
arguments.description: Path to configuration file (unused while command is disabled)

name: run-sequence
description: Run a sequence of commands with various execution options

options.name: parent
options.description: The parent ID of the category

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank of the category

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the category to get

options.name: format
options.description: Output format (table, json)

name: category:list
description: Get a list of categories in MODX

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the category to remove

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the category to update

options.name: description
options.description: The description of the chunk

options.name: category
options.description: The category ID of the chunk

options.name: snippet
options.description: The content of the chunk

options.name: locked
options.description: Whether the chunk is locked (1 or 0)

options.name: static
options.description: Whether the chunk is static (1 or 0)

options.name: static_file
options.description: The static file path for the chunk

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the chunk to get

options.name: format
options.description: Output format (table, json)

name: chunk:list
description: Get a list of chunks in MODX

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the chunk to remove

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the chunk to update

name: config:add
description: Add a MODX instance to the configuration

description: Edit a MODX instance in the configuration

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the instance to edit

name: config:exclude-command
description: Exclude a command from the available commands

name: config:get-exclude-command
description: Get the list of excluded commands

name: config:list
description: List MODX instances in the configuration

name: config:rename
description: Rename a MODX instance in the configuration

arguments.name: old_name
arguments.description: The current name of the instance

arguments.name: new_name
arguments.description: The new name of the instance

name: config:rm
description: Remove a MODX instance from the configuration

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the instance to remove

name: config:rm-exclude-command
description: Remove a command from the excluded commands

arguments.name: class
arguments.description: The command class to remove from the excluded commands

name: config:set-default
description: Set a MODX instance as the default

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the instance to set as default

options.description: The description of the context

options.description: The rank/order of the context

description: Get a list of contexts in MODX

options.name: namespace
options.description: The setting namespace

options.name: xtype

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the template variable

options.name: caption
options.description: The caption of the template variable

options.name: description
options.description: The description of the template variable

options.name: category
options.description: The category ID of the template variable

options.name: type
options.description: The input type of the template variable (text, textarea, richtext, etc.)

options.name: default_text
options.description: The default value of the template variable

options.name: elements
options.description: The possible values for the template variable (for select, radio, etc.)

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank of the template variable

options.name: display
options.description: The display type of the template variable

options.name: templates
options.description: Comma-separated list of template IDs to associate with the template variable

options.name: locked
options.description: Whether the template variable is locked (1 or 0)

options.name: static
options.description: Whether the template variable is static (1 or 0)

options.name: static_file
options.description: The static file path for the template variable

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the template variable to get

options.name: format
options.description: Output format (table, json)
